общественный деятель: Expert of a Child Support Foundation
“Сиротские истории” — это проект о наруш: We want to share the stories of orphans and their adoptive parents. “Orphan stories” is a series of materials about children who were abandoned by their family and the state. Some of them go to a shelter immediately after birth, some go to the hospital, others are raped and beaten in orphanages. They are betrayed not only by mothers, but also by state: instead of promised apartments many of them are settled in barracks with rats. Almost every orphanage graduate fail to get higher education and decent work. There are hundreds of thousands orphans in Russia, but their voices are almost inaudible. “Orphan stories” is incomplete, but true picture of the life of some of them.
